```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r getdata_linear_regression}

data(iris)

mydata = iris %>% filter(Species == "virginica")

lm_model = lm(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width , data = mydata)
summary(lm_model)
plot(mydata$Sepal.Width , mydata$Sepal.Length, pch = 19 , col="blue" , xlab="Sepal Width" , ylab = "Sepal Length" , main="Linear Regression : Lenth ~ Width") 
abline(lm_model, col="red" , lwd=2)

```
